scripts.copyBaseReadMe: for dir in packages/*; do cp README.md "$dir/"; done
scripts.copyOtherReadMes: for dir in packages/*; do cp README-*.md "$dir/"; done
scripts.copyExamples: for dir in packages/*; do cp -r examples "$dir/"; done
scripts.copyFiles: npm run copyBaseReadMe && npm run copyOtherReadMes && npm run copyExamples
scripts.publishAll: npm run copyFiles && npm publish -w=packages/core && npm publish -w=packages/generate && npm publish -w=packages/mongodb
scripts.generate: npm run build -w=packages/core && npx autographcraft generate
